title: Predicting E-Learning System Adoption: TAM-Based Practitioner Competency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Implementing context-based learning using VR simulations in smartphone-dominated, limited technological environments

learning_goals: The components of the Technology Acceptance Model (TAM) (perceived usefulness, perceived ease of use, etc.) can be applied to practical settings
Analytical tools can be utilized to predict user acceptance when introducing e-learning systems
Technology acceptance patterns of organizational members can be diagnosed in VR simulation environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
